definition: noisy/cacophonous/to make noise/to disturb/to vent (feelings)/to fall ill/to have an attack (of sickness)/to go in (for some activity)/to joke
ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations

sentences.english: I heard this house is haunted, and people always see“ghosts”here.
sentences.chinese: 我听说这房子闹鬼，还有人在这儿见过“鬼”呢。

sentences.english: Get a Cadaver to grab and kill a Haunted. (Ch. 2)
sentences.chinese: 在第二章中，用尸体抓住并杀掉一只“闹鬼”。

sentences.english: She hugged Buster to her again.
sentences.chinese: “安斯沃思太太又紧抱住”欢闹鬼“。

sentences.english: The haunted house on the hill brooded above the village.
sentences.chinese: 山上闹鬼的房子赫然耸现在村庄之上。

sentences.english: Ghosts are good for business. Especially in the off-season.
sentences.chinese: 闹鬼益旺财，特别是淡季。

sentences.english: There was a railroad viaduct in Pilsen that was rumored to be haunted.
sentences.chinese: 皮尔森有一座铁路高架桥，传说常常闹鬼。

sentences.english: The QiLe observe investigations, she finally solve the hospital haunted events.
sentences.chinese: 经祁乐明查暗访之下，她终于解开医院闹鬼事件。

sentences.english: Mr.Thompson is going to sell it because it is haunted.
sentences.chinese: 汤普森先生之所以想卖它，是因为那里常闹鬼。

sentences.english: The basement of this building is said to be haunted,but it is just a bullshit.
sentences.chinese: 有人说我们这栋楼的地下室闹鬼，这只不过是鬼话。

sentences.english: I think it is the white lady that haunted the house for years.
sentences.chinese: 我认为这是白夫人的闹鬼的房子里。

sentences.english: The evidence on any 'haunting' is, of course, circumstantial.
sentences.chinese: 当然，任何“闹鬼”的证据都是间接的。

sentences.english: New Bern was haunted now. Haunted by the ghost of her memory.
sentences.chinese: 新伯尔尼是在闹鬼，是她留下的记忆在闹鬼。

sentences.english: New Bern was haunted now. Haunted by the ghost of her memory.
sentences.chinese: 新伯尔尼是在闹鬼，是她留下的记忆在闹鬼。

sentences.english: They say ghosts haunt this house.
sentences.chinese: 据说这所房子里常闹鬼。

sentences.english: Some say our basement of this building has ghost, but that is just a deception.
sentences.chinese: 有人说我们这栋楼的地下室闹鬼，这只不过是鬼话。

sentences.english: The place where we filmed that was a haunted sanatorium.
sentences.chinese: 我们拍摄的地方是一个闹鬼的疗养院。

definition: sudden movement of a corpse (superstition)/fig. sudden torrent of abuse
ghost of a person who died by hanging/hanged person/(coll.) inchworm/hangman (word game)
ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations
